resources.string: Rising food prices have focused increased attention on global agricultural production and supply chains in the past year. As a result, 2022 will be another year of unprecedented supply and demand shocks, tight food supplies, and uncertain climate conditions. Gro Intelligence analyzes the vast amounts of data to produce machine learning-based predictive models that generate valuable knowledge and insights. Gro is the only platform showing the dynamic impact of climate, economic factors, and agricultural systems on each other.

Botanist have discovered and developed ingenious agricultural methods that would have been impossible decades ago. The innovations keep coming, and it doesn\'t look like they\'re slowing down any time soon. Here are some of the top agriculture industry trends we\'re seeing for 2022 and the years to come.

فصل کی کھاد کی تفصیلات درج کریں...
فصل کی کٹائی کی تفصیلات درج کریں...
فصل کا ڈیٹا اپ لوڈ کریں۔
فصل کے بیج کی شرح درج کریں...
